DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test internet-delivered cognitive behavior therapy child adolescent anxiety disorder obsessive-compulsive disorder routine clinical set rural part Sweden .
DOC.brief_title: BIP Jämtland Härjedalen : Increased Access CBT Within Regular Health Care Northern Sweden
DOC.detailed_description: Aim The aim study conduct pragmatic evaluation ICBT child adolescent anxiety disorder OCD within routine health care rural area . Research question - Is ICBT acceptable method patient group ? - Is ICBT effective clinical setting ? - Is treatment need ICBT ? - What long-term effect ICBT ? - What predict treatment outcome ? - How ICBT work clincal setting ? ( time spend , negative effect etc ) ? Design This uncontrolled intervention study include family child recruit consecutively two year routine care CAMHS unit . All participant offer ICBT assess pre- post-treatment , three-month follow-up clinician rating self-report measure . The primary outcome measure clinician rat severity principal disorder three-month follow-up . Long-term result assess study medical record two year complete ICBT .
DOC.criteria: Fulfills diagnostic criterion anxiety disorder OCD Access computer internet connection Read speak Swedish ICBT currently assess suitable treatment Acute psychiatric problem ( eg . severe depression suicidality ) Current psychosocial problem family ( i.e substance abuse , abuse , neglect )
